title: most played champions showing my most played champion is a champion  I've played one game with
body: The the champions  shown that I've"played the most are " {{champion:77}}  and {{champion:15}}   uydr I've played 2 matches with and sivir significantly more. But I know these champions are not my most played and if they were why would it show I've won one match ?

replies.body: Well, if you've only played one game, then it would be your most played champ. It only counts champions you've played with in Ranked.
